/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and red, punctuated with occasional blue and green accents, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the colorful buildings. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, hinting at a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle.
